column3: Includes an after-tax gain of $86 million in the year ended December 31, 2020 related to the sale of PSEG Power’s interest in the Yards Creek generation facility and an after-tax loss of $286 million in the year ended December 31, 2019 related to the sale of PSEG Power’s ownership interests in the Keystone and Conemaugh fossil generation plants. See Note 4. Early Plant Retirements/Asset Dispositions for additional information.
